Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Rain of Embers Stance]{Rain of Embers Stance}.

You rush forward and latch onto your enemy with talons of hungering fire.

Stride once. If you end your movement within reach of at least one enemy, you can make a fire talon Strike against that enemy that deals an additional [[/r {1d4}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Fire Damage}. If it hits and deals damage, you can attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple} the creature you hit.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide
